price: 216. Haddayse ku caasiyaan dheh: Anigu barii baan ka ahay waxaad fashaan.
arabic: فَإِنۡ عَصَوۡكَ فَقُلۡ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-in ʿaṣawka faqul innī barīon mimmā taʿmalūna
